The practical believer, or, The articles of the Apostles Creed drawn out to form a true Christian's heart and practice in two parts. Kettlewell, John, 1653-1695.
[21], 263, [13], 361 [i.e. 261], [2] p.
Printed for Robert Kettlewell and are to be sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster, London : 1688.
Other eds. show author's name on t.p. Each part has special t.p. and separate pagination. Errata: preliminary p. [21] Advertisement: preliminary p. [1] and p. [1]-[2] at end. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library. Includes bibliographical references.
=======
